package.configuration.markdown.editor.drop.enabl: Enable dropping files into a Markdown editor while holding Shift. Requires enabling `#editor.dropIntoEditor.enabled#`.
package.configuration.markdown.editor.pasteLinks: Enable pasting files into a Markdown editor inserts Markdown links. Requires enabling `#editor.experimental.pasteActions.enabled#`.
package.configuration.markdown.links.openLocatio: Open links beside the active editor.
Open links in the active editor group.
Controls where links in Markdown files should be opened.
package.configuration.markdown.occurrencesHighli: Enable highlighting link occurrences in the current document.
package.configuration.markdown.preview.openMarkd: Controls how links to other Markdown files in the Markdown preview should be opened.
Try to open links in the editor.
Try to open links in the Markdown preview.
package.configuration.markdown.suggest.paths.ena: Enable path suggestions while writing links in Markdown files.
package.configuration.markdown.updateLinksOnFile: Enable updating links when a directory is moved or renamed in the workspace.
Try to update links in Markdown files when a file is renamed/moved in the workspace. Use `#markdown.updateLinksOnFileMove.include#` to configure which files trigger link updates.
Never try to update link and don't prompt.
Glob patterns that specifies which files that trigger automatic link updates. See `#markdown.updateLinksOnFileMove.enabled#` for details about this feature.
The glob pattern to match file paths against. Set to true to enable the pattern.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.duplicat: Validate duplicated definitions in the current file.
Enable all error reporting in Markdown files.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.fileLink: Validate links to other files in Markdown files, e.g. `[link](/path/to/file.md)`. This checks that the target files exists. Requires enabling `#markdown.validate.enabled#`.

Validate the fragment part of links to headers in other files in Markdown files, e.g. `[link](/path/to/file.md#header)`. Inherits the setting value from `#markdown.validate.fragmentLinks.enabled#` by default.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.fragment: Validate fragment links to headers in the current Markdown file, e.g. `[link](#header)`. Requires enabling `#markdown.validate.enabled#`.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.ignoredL: Configure links that should not be validated. For example adding `/about` would not validate the link `[about](/about)`, while the glob `/assets/**/*.svg` would let you skip validation for any link to `.svg` files under the `assets` directory.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.referenc: Validate reference links in Markdown files, e.g. `[link][ref]`.  Requires enabling `#markdown.validate.enabled#`.
package.configuration.markdown.validate.unusedLi: Validate link definitions that are unused in the current file.
package.description: Provides rich language support for Markdown.
package.markdown.editor.insertLinkFromWorkspace: Insert Link to File in Workspace
package.markdown.preview.breaks.desc:
Sets how line-breaks are rendered in the Markdown preview. Setting it to 'true' creates a
for newlines inside paragraphs.
package.markdown.preview.doubleClickToSwitchToEd: Double click in the Markdown preview to switch to the editor.
package.markdown.preview.fontFamily.desc: Controls the font family used in the Markdown preview.
package.markdown.preview.fontSize.desc: Controls the font size in pixels used in the Markdown preview.
package.markdown.preview.lineHeight.desc: Controls the line height used in the Markdown preview. This number is relative to the font size.
package.markdown.preview.linkify: Convert URL-like text to links in the Markdown preview.
package.markdown.preview.markEditorSelection.des: Mark the current editor selection in the Markdown preview.
package.markdown.preview.refresh.title: Refresh Preview
package.markdown.preview.scrollEditorWithPreview: When a Markdown preview is scrolled, update the view of the editor.
package.markdown.preview.scrollPreviewWithEditor: When a Markdown editor is scrolled, update the view of the preview.
package.markdown.preview.title: Open Preview
package.markdown.preview.toggleLock.title: Toggle Preview Locking
package.markdown.preview.typographer: Enable some language-neutral replacement and quotes beautification in the Markdown preview.
package.markdown.previewSide.title: Open Preview to the Side
package.markdown.showLockedPreviewToSide.title: Open Locked Preview to the Side
package.markdown.showSource.title: Show Source
package.markdown.styles.dec: A list of URLs or local paths to CSS style sheets to use from the Markdown preview. Relative paths are interpreted relative to the folder open in the Explorer. If there is no open folder, they are interpreted relative to the location of the Markdown file. All '\' need to be written as '\\'.
package.markdown.trace.extension.desc: Enable debug logging for the Markdown extension.
package.markdown.trace.server.desc: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Markdown language server.
package.workspaceTrust: Required for loading styles configured in the workspace.
